post.text: This is a moment when we all need to stand together. Watch live as Hillary speaks on the terrorist attack in Orlando.

comment.author: Abigail
comment.text: Don't understand why you'd ever vote Hilary, she's invested on loads of corporations and a flat out liar as well as voting for the Iraq war. As a Brit I can tell you that the majority of the UK would die to even have the chance of a candidate as sincere and moralistic as Bernie Sanders. Can't believe your about to let that slip through your fingers for another run of the mill candidate. #feelthebern

replies.author: Amina
replies.text: Bernies record is all about income distribution and full strength Dodds/Frank. Hillary has a working plan to enact these; Bernie speaks in generalities while Hillary commands specifics.
